name: Boobs in the city
description:
An excited, diverse, hentai shooting game is online now.
Join 【Boobs In The City】 and meet your water gun girl!

Come to Discord Group. Let’s discuss about something deeper~!!

In 20XX, girl’s water gun competition has become the world’s most convincing new sport, every girl dreams to be on the stage of water gun competition and become the very best!

You, a coach of a newly founded team, is going to train different girls and make their dreams come true. From a professional dancer to a part-time maid; from slender to Thick, you are not just going to teach them water-gun skill. You are going to have a relationship with the girls, date with them, and they will take care of your “water gun”.

Experience an exciting online competition with girls, get them addicted to you, train them with your “water gun” in a 3D design.

Feature:
Experience an excited water gun competition with girls!.
Training girls with your” water gun” in 3D!!
Date with girls and make them addicted to “you”.
